= 单位管理 =

<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">FreeCMS</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">支持多单位同时使用<span>,</span>并支持无限树级管理。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>1.<span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">添加一级单位</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">从左侧管理菜单点击单位管理进入。</span></p>
<p sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="3">
	<span sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="3" style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121345_eiXA_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="3" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121345_eiXA_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击&ldquo;添加一级单位&rdquo;</span></p>
<p sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="4">
	<span sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="4" style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121413_8FM9_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="4" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121413_8FM9_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入相关属性点击&ldquo;保存&rdquo;即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击&ldquo;保存&rdquo;后下方会显示操作记录</span></p>
<p sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="5">
	<span sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="5" style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121431_hSW2_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="5" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121431_hSW2_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">当提示<span>&rdquo;</span>添加单位<span> XXX </span>成功<span>&rdquo;</span>时表明此单位已添加。刷新页面后可以看到。</span></p>
<p sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="6">
	<span sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="6" style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121452_5W69_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="6" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121452_5W69_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>2.<span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">添加下级单位</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击需要添加下级单位的单位，如&ldquo;一级单位&rdquo;</span></p>
<p sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="7">
	<span sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="7" style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121513_apQu_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="7" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121513_apQu_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击&ldquo;添加下级单位&rdquo;</span></p>
<p sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="8">
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121531_nxcy_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="8" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121531_nxcy_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">填写相关属性后点击&ldquo;保存&rdquo;即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击&ldquo;保存&rdquo;后下方会显示操作记录</span></p>
<p sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="9">
	<span sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="9" style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121552_32Z9_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="9" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121552_32Z9_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">当提示<span>&rdquo;</span>添加单位<span> XXX </span>成功<span>&rdquo;</span>时表明此单位已添加。刷新页面后可以看到。</span></p>
<p sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="10">
	<span sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="10" style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121608_7iic_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="10" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121608_7iic_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>3.<span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">改变所属单位</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">为了方便用户使用，<span>FreeCMS</span>提供了改变单位结构的简便方法，使您在想对单位结构作出调整时不需要删除重建单位。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要改变所属单位的单位，如&ldquo;一级单位&rdquo;</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121644_M6Em_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="11" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121644_M6Em_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击&ldquo;改变所属单位&rdquo;</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121701_zokq_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="12" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121701_zokq_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要调整的位置，如&ldquo;</span><span>freeteam</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">&rdquo;，直接点击即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121719_lSUC_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="13" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121719_lSUC_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">注意</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：</span></p>
<p>
	<span><span>1）<span> </span></span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体">如果选择&ldquo;单位管理&rdquo;，则此单位会变为一级单位。</span></p>
<p>
	<span><span>2）<span> </span></span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体">在改变所属单位时，此单位的子单位不会改变。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>4.<span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">删除单位</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">删除单位功能将删除指定单位及子单位，此操作不可恢复，请慎重操作。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要删除的单位，如&ldquo;一级单位&rdquo;</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121743_QDFN_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="14" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121743_QDFN_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击&ldquo;删除&rdquo;按钮</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121805_aWja_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="15" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121805_aWja_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">为会防止用户误操作，系统会提示用户确认，点击&ldquo;确定&rdquo;按钮</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击&ldquo;确定&rdquo;后下方会显示操作记录</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121831_wUts_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="16" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121831_wUts_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">当提示<span>&rdquo;</span>删除单位<span> XXX </span>成功<span>&rdquo;</span>时表明此单位已删除。刷新页面后可以看到。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121851_gUBV_916014.gif" sizcache08360233700510353="7" sizset="17" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1221/121851_gUBV_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
